title: [Tuts Plus] Mastering Sketch Design in Illustrator-KTR
description:
[Tuts Plus] Mastering Sketch Design in Illustrator-KTR


PUBLISHER....: Tuts Plus                
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......:  Mary Winkler
RUNTIME......: 2.2H 0M


In this course youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll dive right in and create a still life entirely in Adobe Illustrator. By the end of the course, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll know how to freely sketch, draw, and paint complete designs in Illustrator without using any additional applications.
